unittitle_ssm: Petition for the widening of Henry Street
abstract_ssm: A petition written by residents of Brooklyn, dated 1833, asking the President and Trustees of the Village of Brooklyn for the widening of Henry Street in the neighborhood of Brooklyn Heights. It is indicated on the document that this is a copy of the original petition. The names of the original creators are unknown.
